column4: I am dualbooting winxp and ubuntu,  would it be possible to run a virtual machine through ubuntu of the winxp?
If i run the VMware through ubuntu can i run xp as a virtual machine (the one I already have installed)
yes, vmware and on the vm site there are pre built ubuntu virtual machines
yes, just a fyi you should be able to use vmplayer and create a vm with xp - i would use the the download from vwware site though
